Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class AutomatonCodec

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAltAutomatonCodec, FSACodec, GameCodec
public abstract class AutomatonCodec
extends XMLCodec
An AutomatonCodec provides methods for encoding an automaton in GOAL file format (GFF) and decoding a GFF file back to an automaton.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

      Parameters:

      public boolean isStructureOnly()
      Returns true if this codec will save only automaton structures.
      Returns:
      true if this codec will save only automaton structures

      Parameters:

    • addRootAttributes

      protected void addRootAttributes​(Automaton aut, org.w3c.dom.Element root)
      Inserts attributes to the root element.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be encoded
      root - the root element of the GFF file

    • getType

      public abstract java.lang.String getType()
      Returns the type of the automaton to be encoded or decoded. The type will appear in the GFF file as an attribute of the root element.
      Returns:
      the unique type name of the automaton to be encoded or decoded

    • isTypeAccepted

      public boolean isTypeAccepted​(java.lang.String type)
      Returns true if a type is accepted by this codec. When this codec writes on an XML file, the only one type from #getType() will be used. But when reading an XML file, this codec may want to accept more types as aliases.
      Parameters:
      type - a type read
      Returns:
      true if the type is accepted by this codec

    • decodeGraphicComponentIDSet

      protected GraphicComponent[] decodeGraphicComponentIDSet​(Automaton aut, org.w3c.dom.NodeList comps) throws CodecException
      Decodes a NodeList as a set of graphic component IDs and returns the graphic components with that IDs in the automaton to be decoded.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be decoded
      comps - a NodeList representing a set of graphic component IDs
      Returns:
      the graphic components with IDs represented by comps in aut
      Throws:
      CodecException - if some graphic component cannot be found in aut

    • decodeStateIDSet

      protected State[] decodeStateIDSet​(Automaton aut, org.w3c.dom.NodeList states) throws CodecException
      Decodes a NodeList as a set of state IDs and returns the states with that IDs in the automaton to be decoded.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be decoded
      states - a NodeList representing a set of state IDs
      Returns:
      the states with IDs represented by states in aut
      Throws:
      CodecException - if some state cannot be found in aut

    • decodeTransitionIDSet

      protected Transition[] decodeTransitionIDSet​(Automaton aut, org.w3c.dom.NodeList trans) throws CodecException
      Decodes a NodeList as a set of transition IDs and returns the transitions with that IDs in the automaton to be decoded.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be decoded
      trans - a NodeList representing a set of transition IDs
      Returns:
      the transitions with IDs represented by states in aut
      Throws:
      CodecException - if some transition cannot be found in aut

    • encodeGraphicComponentIDSet

      protected java.util.Collection<org.w3c.dom.Element> encodeGraphicComponentIDSet​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, java.util.Collection<? extends GraphicComponent> cs)
      Encodes a set of graphic components as a set of XML elements. Each element represents the ID of the corresponding component.
      Parameters:
      doc - the XML document
      cs - graphic components to be encoded
      Returns:
      XML elements corresponding to IDs of cs

    • encodeProperties

      protected org.w3c.dom.Element encodeProperties​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, Editable obj, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> excludes)
      Encodes other properties of an editable object as an element in an XML document.
      Parameters:
      doc - an XML document
      obj - an editable object
      excludes - built-in properties that should be excluded
      Returns:
      an XML element in doc representing other properties of obj

      protected void decodeProperties​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Editable obj, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> excludes) throws CodecException
      Decodes other properties of an editable object from an XML element.
      Parameters:
      e - an XML element
      obj - an editable object
      excludes - built-in properties that should be excluded
      Throws:
      CodecException - if e is not well-formed

      s - the state to be encoded
      Returns:
      an XML element in doc representing the state s

    • decodeState

      public State decodeState​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Automaton aut) throws CodecException
      Decodes a state of the automaton to be decoded.
      Parameters:
      e - the XML element representing a state
      aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file
      Returns:
      the state represented by e
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the decoding of e fails

    • encodeTransition

      public org.w3c.dom.Element encodeTransition​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, Transition t)
      Encodes a transition as an element of an XML document.
      Parameters:
      doc - an XML document
      t - the transition to be encoded
      Returns:
      an XML element in doc representing the transition t

    • decodeTransition

      public Transition decodeTransition​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Automaton aut) throws CodecException
      Decodes an XML element as a transition.
      Parameters:
      e - an XML element to be decoded
      aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file to be decoded
      Returns:
      the transition in aut represented by e
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the tag name or the tid attribute is invalid, or the source state or the destination state cannot be found in aut

    • encodeAcc

      public void encodeAcc​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Acc<?> acc)
      Encodes an acceptance condition as an XML element.
      Parameters:
      e - the XML element representing the acceptance condition acc
      acc - an acceptance condition to be encoded

    • decodeAcc

      public Acc<?> decodeAcc​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Automaton aut) throws CodecException
      Decodes an XML element as an acceptance condition.
      Parameters:
      e - an XML element to be decoded
      aut - the automaton represented by the GFF file to be decoded
      Returns:
      the acceptance condition represented by e
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the tag name or type attribute is invalid, or the states or the transitions in the acceptance condition cannot be found in aut

    • getRoot

      protected org.w3c.dom.Element getRoot​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the root element of a GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the root element of doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the tag name of the root element is invalid or there are more than one root elements

    • getType

      protected java.lang.String getType​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the automaton type of a GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the type of the automaton represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the type of the automaton represented by doc is different from the type supported by this codec

    • getLabelPosition

      protected Position getLabelPosition​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the label position of the automaton represented by a specified GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the label position of the automaton represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if it fails to get the root element or the label position cannot be recognized

    • getAlphabetType

      protected AlphabetType getAlphabetType​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the alphabet type of the automaton represented by a specified GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the alphabet type of the automaton represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if it fails to get the root element or the alphabet type cannot be recognized

    • getPropositions

      protected java.lang.String[] getPropositions​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the propositions of the automaton represented by a specified GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the propositions of the automaton represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if it fails to get the root element or the alphabet type is invalid

    • createAutomaton

      protected abstract Automaton createAutomaton​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Creates a new instance of an automaton with the same type as the automaton type specified by the document to be decoded.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      a new automaton with the same type as the automaton type specified by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if it fails to create such an automaton

      public Automaton fromDOM​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Description copied from class: XMLCodec
      Decodes an XML document as an editable object.
      Specified by:
      fromDOM in class XMLCodec
      Parameters:
      doc - the XML document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the editable object represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if there is an error in decoding doc

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
